definition: Lishu county in Siping 四平, Jilin/Lishu district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
Lishu county in Siping 四平, Jilin
Lishu district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: The pear trees are blossoming out early this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年梨树很早就在开花了。

sentences.english: Come and see, behind our teaching building, there are some small pear trees covered with white flowers;
sentences.chinese: 请来瞧一瞧，教学楼后，小梨树上挂满了白花。

sentences.english: The infestation of avocado root rot disease is not visually detectable.
sentences.chinese: 鳄梨树根腐病的感染用视觉是无法探测出来的。

sentences.english: Thorn roses and thistle and pears.
sentences.chinese: 还有刺玫瑰，大蓟和梨树。

sentences.english: She tried to engraft a peach on a plum.
sentences.chinese: 她试图把桃树嫁接在梨树上。

sentences.english: In the meadows under the pears.
Pear trees are grafted on quince rootstocks.
sentences.chinese: 梨树被嫁接到榅的根茎上。

sentences.english: There are many pear trees covered in blossom.
sentences.chinese: 那儿那里有良多开满花的梨树。

sentences.english: My home is at 1659 pear tree street .
It’s now time to plant the young avocado tree.
sentences.chinese: 现在就来种一棵小油梨树吧。

sentences.english: If freeze damage occurs, you should wait until spring before pruning avocado trees.
sentences.chinese: 如果出现鳄梨树冻伤，你应该等到开春才可以修剪。

sentences.english: In gardens, cankers are most prominent on apples and pear trees.
sentences.chinese: 花园里，苹果树和梨树患枯枝病最明显。

sentences.english: The cherry and hoary pear, scatter their snow around.
sentences.chinese: 樱桃梨树共争艳，四处飞花如雪片。

sentences.english: And a Partridge in a Pear Tree.
He has been pruning the pear trees.
We have a garden and plenty of pears .
sentences.chinese: 我家有个园子，栽着好多梨树。

definition: Yushu county level city in Changchun 長春|长春, Jilin
Catalpa bungei or Manchurian Catalpa, a tea plant
poplar tree/various trees of genus Populus
